ch.hsr.bieridee.android.adapters
Class JsonListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  BaseAdapter
      ch.hsr.bieridee.android.adapters.JsonListAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrewerySizeSpinnerAdapter, CreateBeerSpinnerAdapter, RecommendationsListAdapter
public abstract class JsonListAdapter
extends BaseAdapter

The BreweryListAdapter adapts the JSON brewery structure to the Android ListView. For further information, see the Adapter interface: http://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/Adapter.html
